snippet.title: Mega Cat Studios - Almost Hero - An NES Beat 'em up Video Game
snippet.description:
Ready for release after printing is complete!  Punch, kick, and hero your way to saving a struggling bonsai e-commerce business with sweet ninja moves.  Complimentary Foot Passion subscriptions available with some orders at Andy's discretion!

Get your copy at: https://megacatstudios.com/collections/nes-games/products/almost-hero-for-the-nintendo-entertainment-system

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Almost Hero is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by Nintendo Co. Ltd, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the Nintendo console, and is not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd, or their affiliates. 

Nintendo® and Famicom® are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
